item.title: Bash Command Alternatives in PowerShell
item.description: Bash and PowerShell are two popular command-line shells that can help you automate tasks and manage your system. Bash is the default shell for Linux and macOS, while PowerShell is the default shell for Windows.

item.title: Get Your Public IP Address Using the Terminal
item.description: We get our private IP address using the terminal all the time. I’m sure we’ve all used ipconfig /all in Windows.
